paragraphs.text:
%md
# 30 Minutes Scala

var x = 1+2
x = 3*4
println(x)

val y=1+2
// y=2*3
println(y)

var a,b,c=5
println(a)
println(b)
println(c)

var x = 10
var y = 1

println("1. " + x + " is bigger than " + y)
println(s"2. $x is bigger than $y")
println(s"3. $x + $y = ${x+y}")
printf("4. pi is %f",Math.PI)

val range1 = 1 to 10
println(s"1. 1 to 10 -> \n\t $range1")
println(s"2. 1 until 10 -> ${1 until 10}")

val reverse = "Scala".reverse
println(s"1. $reverse")
val cap = "scala".capitalize
println(s"2. $cap")
val multi = "Scala!"*7
println(s"3. $multi")
val int = "123".toInt
println(s"4. $int")

paragraphs.title: Anonymous Function
paragraphs.text:
def doWithOneAndTwo(f: (Int, Int) => Int) = {
    f(1, 2)
}

val call1 = doWithOneAndTwo((x:Int, y:Int) => x + y)
val call2 = doWithOneAndTwo((x,y) => x + y)
val call3 = doWithOneAndTwo(_ + _)

println(call1, call2, call3)

paragraphs.title: Anonymous Function 2
paragraphs.text:
def add1(x:Int, y:Int) = x + y  //method
val add2 = (x:Int, y:Int) => x + y  //anonymous func
val add3:(Int,Int)=>Int = _ + _ //anonymous func
val add4 = (_ + _):(Int,Int)=>Int  //anonymous func

println(s"[1] ${add1(42,13)}")
println(s"[2] ${add2(42,13)}")
println(s"[3] ${add3(42,13)}")
println(s"[4] ${add4(42,13)}")

paragraphs.title: Tuple
paragraphs.text:
val t1 = new Tuple3(1, "Hello", true)
val t2 = (1, "Hello", true)

println(t2)

var numbers = (1,2,3,4)
val sum = numbers._1 + numbers._2 + numbers._3 + numbers._4
println(sum)

paragraphs.title: Tuple 2
paragraphs.text:
def swap1(x:String, y:String) = (y,x)
val swap2 = (x:String, y:String) => (y,x)
val (a,b) = swap1("hello", "world")
val (c,d) = swap2("hello", "world")
println(a,b)
println(c,d)

paragraphs.title: Variable
Loop
paragraphs.text:
var i, sum = 0
while(i<10) {
    sum += i
    i += 1
}

println(s"1. $sum")

sum = 0

for(i <- 0 until 10) {
    sum += i
}
println(s"2. $sum")

sum = 0

sum = (0 until 10).sum
println(s"3. $sum")

paragraphs.title: Loop 2
Condition
Array
paragraphs.text:
def printArray[K](array:Array[K]) =
    println(array.mkString("Array(",", ",")"))
    
val array1 = Array(1,2,3)
print("1. ")
printArray(array1)

val array2 = Array("a",2,true)
print("2. ")
printArray(array2)

val itemAtIndex0 = array1(0)
array1(0) = 4
print("3. ")
printArray(array1)
println(itemAtIndex0)

//배열 붙일때는 ++연산자 사용
//앞에 붙일때는 +:, 뒤에 붙일때는 :+
val concatenated = "앞에 붙이기" +: (array1 ++ array2) :+ "뒤에 붙이기"
print("4. array1과 array2를 더하면: ")
printArray(concatenated)

paragraphs.title: Array 2
paragraphs.text:
array2.indexOf("a")

val array3 = Array("a", "a", "b", "b", 1, 2, 3, 3)
array3.indexOf("a")

%md
# Zeppelin Lecture (cyber.dbguide.net)

val list = List(1, 2, 3)
val rdd = sc.parallelize(list)

list.size
rdd.count
list.filter(x => x > 1).size
rdd.filter(x => x > 1).count
rdd.collect
rdd.map(x => x * 2).filter(x => x > 2).collect

val list2 = List(List(1, 2), List(3, 4))
val rdd2 = sc.parallelize(list2)
rdd2.collect
rdd2.flatMap(list => list.map(x => x * 2)).collect

val rdd3 = sc.parallelize(List(1,2,2,3))
val rdd4 = sc.parallelize(List(2,3,4))
rdd3.intersection(rdd4).collect
rdd3.distinct().collect

val rdd5 = sc.parallelize(List((1, "A"), (2, "B")))
val rdd6 = sc.parallelize(List((1, "C"), (3, "D")))
rdd5.join(rdd6).collect

val rdd7 = sc.parallelize(List("1", "2", "3", "4"))
rdd7.reduce((a, b) => a + b)

paragraphs.title: Ex2-9, 2-12
paragraphs.text:
val rdd = sc.parallelize(1 to 10)
val result1 = rdd.collect
println(result1.mkString(", "))

val result2 = rdd.count
println(result2)

paragraphs.title: Ex2-15
paragraphs.text:
val rdd = sc.parallelize(1 to 5)
val result = rdd.map(_ + 1)
println(result.collect.mkString(", "))

paragraphs.title: Ex2-18, 2-21
paragraphs.text:
val fruits = List("apple,orange", "grape,apple,mango", "blueberry,tomato")
val rddf = sc.parallelize(fruits)
val rddf1 = rddf.map(_.split(","))
                .collect()
println(rddf1.map(_.mkString("{",", ","}"))
             .mkString("{",", ","}"))
val rddf2 = rddf.flatMap(_.split(","))
print(rddf2.collect.mkString(","))

paragraphs.title: Ex2-22
Ex2-23, 2-26 mapPartitions withindex
Ex2-29
paragraphs.text:
val rdd = sc.parallelize(List("a", "b", "c")).map((_, 1))
val result = rdd.mapValues(i => i + 1)
println(result.collect.mkString("\t"))

paragraphs.title: Ex2-32
paragraphs.text:
val rdd = sc.parallelize(Seq((1, "a,b"), (2, "a,c"), (1, "d,e")))
val result = rdd.flatMapValues(_.split(","))
println(result.collect.mkString("\t"))

paragraphs.title: Ex2-35
paragraphs.text:
val rdd1 = sc.parallelize(List("a", "b", "c"))
val rdd2 = sc.parallelize(List(1, 2, 3))
val result = rdd1.zip(rdd2) //keys.zip(values)
println(result.collect.mkString(", "))

paragraphs.title: Ex2-52
paragraphs.text:
val rdd1 = sc.parallelize(List(1, 2, 3))
val rdd2 = sc.parallelize(List("a", "b", "c"))
val rdd3 = sc.parallelize(List("!", "@", "#"))
val result = rdd1.cartesian(rdd2).cartesian(rdd3)
println(result.collect.mkString(", "))

paragraphs.title: Ex2-52
paragraphs.text:
val rdd1 = sc.parallelize(List(1, 2, 3))
val rdd2 = sc.parallelize(List("a", "b", "c"))
val rdd3 = sc.parallelize(List("!", "@", "#"))
val result = rdd1.cartesian(rdd2).cartesian(rdd3)
println(result.collect.mkString(", "))

paragraphs.title: Ex2-55
paragraphs.text:
val rdd1 = sc.parallelize(List("a", "b", "c", "d", "e"))
val rdd2 = sc.parallelize(List("d", "e"))
val result = rdd1.subtract(rdd2)
println(result.collect.mkString(", "))

val rdd1 = sc.parallelize(List("a", "b", "c"))
val rdd2 = sc.parallelize(List("d", "e", "f"))
val result = rdd1.union(rdd2)
println(result.collect.mkString(", "))

val rdd1 = sc.parallelize(List("a", "b", "c"))
val rdd2 = sc.parallelize(List("d", "e", "f"))
val result = rdd1.union(rdd2)
println(result.collect.mkString(", "))

paragraphs.title: Correlation test

paragraphs.text:
val seq = Seq(
    Vectors.dense(1.0, 10.0, 100.0, 1000.0),
    Vectors.dense(2.0, 20.0, 200.0, 2000.0),
    Vectors.dense(5.0, 33.0, 366.0, 2973.0))

Statistics.corr(sc.parallelize(seq), "pearson")

seq +: Seq(Vectors.dense(4.0, 40.0, 405.0, 4500.0))

Statistics.corr(sc.parallelize(seq), "pearson")

%pyspark
from pyspark.mllib.stat import Statistics
import numpy as np

seriesX = sc.parallelize([1.0, 2.0, 3.0, 3.0, 5.0])  # a series
# seriesY must have the same number of partitions and cardinality as seriesX
seriesY = sc.parallelize([11.0, 22.0, 33.0, 33.0, 555.0])

# Compute the correlation using Pearson's method. Enter "spearman" for Spearman's method.
# If a method is not specified, Pearson's method will be used by default.
print("Correlation is: " + str(Statistics.corr(seriesX, seriesY, method="pearson")))

data = sc.parallelize(
    [np.array([1.0, 10.0, 100.0]), np.array([2.0, 20.0, 200.0]), np.array([5.0, 33.0, 366.0])]
)  # an RDD of Vectors

# calculate the correlation matrix using Pearson's method. Use "spearman" for Spearman's method.
# If a method is not specified, Pearson's method will be used by default.
print(Statistics.corr(data, method="pearson"))
